title: Intro to Operations Research
description: An introductory course on the fundamentals of operations research and optimization techniques.

title: Basics of Queueing Theory
description: Explore the core concepts of queueing theory and its applications in various industries.

title: Stochastic Processes and Applications
description: A comprehensive course on probability and stochastic processes, including real-world examples.

title: Discrete Mathematics for Computer Science
description: Learn about discrete mathematics with a focus on its importance in computer science.
